All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BookingFailedException
This exception is thrown when a booking attempt fails.
DatabaseException
This exception is thrown when there is a database-related error.
FlipFitAdmin
Represents an administrator for FlipFit.
FlipFitAdminDAO
The FlipFitAdminDAO class provides the implementation for the data access layer responsible for performing database operations related to FlipFitAdmin functionalities.
FlipFitAdminDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit Admin DAO (Data Access Object).
FlipFitAdminInterface
Interface for FlipFit Admin Business Logic.
FlipFitAdminMenu
This class represents the admin menu for FlipFit application, providing options to approve, reject, and view the status of gyms and gym owners.
FlipFitAdminService
Service class implementing the FlipFitAdminInterface.
FlipFitApplication
This is the main class for the FlipFit application that serves as the entry point for the user interface.
FlipFitBooking
Represents a booking for a FlipFit session.
FlipFitConstants
The FlipFitConstants class contains a collection of constant SQL queries used throughout the FlipFit application.
FlipFitCustomer
Represents a customer in the FlipFit system.
FlipFitCustomerDAO
The FlipFitCustomerDAO class provides the implementation for the data access layer responsible for performing database operations related to customer functionalities.
FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit Customer DAO (Data Access Object).
FlipFitCustomerInterface
Interface for FlipFit Customer Business Logic.
FlipFitCustomerMenu
This class represents the customer menu for the FlipFit application, providing options for customers to view gyms, select gyms, book slots, view their bookings, and log out.
FlipFitCustomerService
Service class responsible for handling customer operations such as registration, gym selection, slot booking, and viewing bookings.
FlipFitDBConnection
Utility class to manage the database connection for the FlipFit application.
FlipFitGymCentre
Represents a gym center in the FlipFit system.
FlipFitGymOwner
Represents a gym owner in the FlipFit system.
FlipFitGymOwnerDAO
The FlipFitGymOwnerDAO class provides the implementation of the data access layer responsible for performing database operations related to gym owners.
FlipFitGymOwnerDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit Gym Owner DAO (Data Access Object).
FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
Interface for FlipFit Gym Owner Business Logic.
FlipFitGymOwnerMenu
This class represents the Gym Owner menu for the FlipFit application.
FlipFitGymOwnerService
Service class responsible for handling gym owner operations, including registering gym owners, adding gyms, removing gyms, and viewing gym lists.
FlipFitNotification
Represents a notification associated with a booking in the FlipFit application.
FlipFitPayment
Represents a payment transaction in the FlipFit application.
FlipFitRole
Represents a role within the FlipFit application.
FlipFitSlot
Represents a time slot available at a gym.
FlipFitUser
Represents a user in the FlipFit application.
FlipFitUserDAO
The FlipFitUserDAO class is responsible for handling database operations related to users.
FlipFitUserDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit User DAO (Data Access Object).
FlipFitUserInterface
Interface for FlipFit User Business Logic.
FlipFitUserService
Service class responsible for handling user-related operations like registration, login, logout, and password change.
GymListFetchException
This exception is thrown when there is an error while fetching the list of gyms.
GymNotApprovedException
This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to access or perform operations on a gym that has not been approved yet.
GymNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when the specified gym is not found in the system.
GymOwnerAlreadyExistsException
This exception is thrown when a gym owner already exists in the system.
GymOwnerNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when a gym owner is not found in the system.
GymOwnerRegistrationException
This exception is thrown when there is an error during the registration of a gym owner.
GymStatusNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when a gym status is not found.
InvalidCustomerDataException
This exception is thrown when invalid data is provided for a customer.
NoBookingsFoundException
This exception is thrown when no bookings are found for a customer.
NoGymsFoundException
This exception is thrown when no gyms are found in the system.
NoSlotsAvailableException
This exception is thrown when there are no available slots for a specific gym or activity.
